cause.description:
The Branch Church is a new church plant in the North San Bernardino area. You can find out more about The Branch by visiting www.thebranchonline.com
We are currently accepting donations and offerings made payable by check to The Branch Church. Please mail to P.O. Box 9487, San Bernardino, CA 92427. All contributions are tax-deductible.
1. Evangelism, Discipleship, Fellowship, Worship, and Ministry
cause.name: The Branch Church
